Package de.ikor.sip.foundation.core.declarative

Class AdapterBuilder

java.lang.Object
org.apache.camel.builder.BuilderSupport
org.apache.camel.builder.RouteBuilder
de.ikor.sip.foundation.core.declarative.AdapterBuilder
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.camel.CamelContextAware, org.apache.camel.Ordered, org.apache.camel.RoutesBuilder, org.apache.camel.spi.ResourceAware
@Component public class AdapterBuilder extends org.apache.camel.builder.RouteBuilder
This class is setting up Camel routes from the scenario- and connector-definitions specified in the adapter.

Intended for internal use only
